attributes.action: Allow the transfer of Road Tax within a household of more than one vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For those who own more than one vehicle e.g. a family car for weekends and perhaps a small commuting car\motorbike for work - allow the transfer of Road Tax between vehicles so that only the vehicle being used on a public road at that time need display the tax disc.

An individual who owns two vehicles should not have to purchase Road Tax for both as only one can be used at a time.

I hereby petition the Government to introduce a 'Personal' Road Tax which can be allocated to an individual person, not to vehicles - then that person may drive any car they own using a single Road Tax certificate!.
